trading-schedule.post-create-fund: Please note that this fund will be processed when the Stock Exchange is open.
trading-schedule.invest-fund: Your investment/withdrawal request will be processed when the Stock Exchange is open.

validations.link-max-length: The maximum link length is 100 characters.
validations.resolution: The resolution of the uploaded image is too low.
validations.file-is-large: The uploaded image file is too large.
validations.min-value: Must be greater than or equal to {{minAmount}}
validations.amount-more-than-wallet-balance: Amount is greater than the account balance
validations.fixedVolume-min: {{fixedCurrency}} equivalent must be greater than or equal to 0
validations.fixedVolume-max: {{fixedCurrency}} equivalent must be less than or equal to 99999
validations.percent-min: Percent must be greater than or equal to 1%
validations.percent-max: Percent must be less than or equal to 999%
validations.tolerance-percent-min: Tolerance percent must be greater than or equal to 0.01
validations.tolerance-percent-max: Tolerance percent must be less than or equal to 20%
validations.amount-more-than-account-balance: Amount is greater than the account balance
validations.amount-more-than-available: Amount is more than available in your wallet
validations.amount-exceeds-limit: Amount exceeds the possible investment limit
validations.exit-fee-min: Exit fee must be greater than 0 %
validations.exit-fee-max: Exit fee must be less than {{max}} %
validations.assets-share: Total share of all assets should be equal to 100%
validations.assets-count: Must be at least two assets.
validations.stop-out-more-current: Can't be more than a current value
validations.greater-zero: Amount must be greater than zero
validations.success-fee-min: Must be greater or equal than 0 %
validations.min: Must be more or equal than {{min}}
validations.max: Must be less or equal than {{max}}

table.no-items: There are no items to display.

alerts.copy-error: Failed to copy data to the clipboard.
alerts.server-error: Server error occurred. Please try again later or contact the support department.

tooltips.create-account: Create a trading account and get access to a variety of instruments (depending on your desired broker.) Trade Forex, Crypto, CFD, Stocks, Metals, Indices and Commodities.
tooltips.create-fund-1: Diversify your capital across hundreds of cryptocurrencies.
tooltips.create-fund-2: 1. Create a fund by percentage allocating capital to crypto assets that meet your strategy.
tooltips.create-fund-3: 2. Attract investors to your fund and earn commissions
tooltips.create-fund-4: 3. Track and manage your fund by re-allocating assets.
tooltips.create-program-1: Programs are similar to PAMM accounts.
tooltips.create-program-2: 1. Create a program and raise capital for ongoing trading by attracting investors.
tooltips.create-program-3: 2. Trade using the assets under management (AUM) and earn profit. Any profits generated will be divided among all participants who have joined your program.
tooltips.create-program-4: 3. Set your own commissions and receive a percentage of the investors' profit.
tooltips.attach-external-account: Add your Binance account to the platform to copy trades opened and managed by another trader, while having complete control over your capital. You can also make your account a signal provider at any time.
tooltips.create-self-managed-fund: Create your own portfolio with crypto assets that match your strategy. You can change its entire structure at any time. Self managed Funds are private so you cannot attract investor capital. All re-allocation history, profits and losses are kept private. You can always change your fund to Public to attract investment.

tag.high-risk: Program stop out level is from 31 to 100%
tag.medium-risk: Program stop out level is from 11 to 30%
tag.signal: You can copy trades from this program using GV Follow

server-connection-error-page.title: Server Error
server-connection-error-page.body: Server error occurred. Please try again later or contact the support department.

my-history.refund: Amount of funds that have been returned to your wallet.

wallet-deposit.title: Deposit
wallet-deposit.copy-to-clipboard-success: Address is copied to the clipboard
wallet-deposit.copy-to-clipboard-error: Failed to copy the data to the clipboard.
wallet-deposit.disclaimer: After processing the {{currency}} transaction, your transferred funds will be converted to GVT, according to the current market price. The exact amount of GVT received will be determined at the time of conversion in the market.
wallet-deposit.warning: Send only {{currency}} to this deposit address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.

deposit-asset.title: Invest
deposit-asset.disclaimer: After clicking the "Confirm" button, the invested GVT will be immediately converted to {{currency}}. The transfer of {{currency}} over to the account manager will only occur at the end of the current reporting period.

program.success-alert-message: Successful request for investment in the program.

fund.nasdaq: Your investment/withdrawal request will be processed when the NASDAQ Stock Exchange is open.
fund.success-alert-message: Successful request for investment in the fund.
fund.disclaimer: After clicking the "Confirm" button, your request will be processed within a few minutes.

program-period.waiting-period-start: Waiting for the period to start

withdraw-program.end: the end of the reporting period.
withdraw-program.gm-all-text: You are withdrawing the entire amount that will be available in the Program at the moment the request is processed
withdraw-program.all-text: You are withdrawing the entire amount that will be available in the program at the end of the period
withdraw-program.title: Withdraw
withdraw-program.info: Your request will be processed at {{time}}
withdraw-program.how-much-withdraw: How much would you like to withdraw?

unfollow-program.title: Unfollow Trades
unfollow-program.text: Do you really want to unsubscribe?

manual-closing.label: Manual closing
manual-closing.tooltip: An investor at any time can perform a manual closing of all of the open positions.

close-only.label: Close only
close-only.tooltip: New trades do not open, open positions are closed as the manager closes them.

close-all-immediately.label: Close all immediately
close-all-immediately.tooltip: Instant closing of all open positions.

info.ETH: The minimum order size on Binance is 0.01 ETH
info.BTC: The minimum order size on Binance is 0.001 BTC
info.USDT: The minimum order size on Binance is 10 USDT

bybalance.label: By balance
bybalance.tooltip: The volume of the opened positions is proportional to the balance of the signal provider and an investor.

percent.label: Percentage
percent.tooltip: Positions are opened according to the percentage of the volume of positions opened by the signal provider.

fixed.label: Fixed
fixed.tooltip: Each new position is opened at a fixed amount.

params.title: Trading settings
params.tolerance-percent-tooltip: This parameter shows the percentage of the maximum possible deviation of investors opening price from the price at which the managers transaction was opened. Deviation ranges from 0% to 20%. If the price at the time of opening the transaction changes by more than the specified percentage, then the transaction will not open.
